name: test_e2e_with_logs[527_NOSQL_MONGO_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_MONGO_004` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $exists Authentication Bypass |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"username": {"$exists": true}, "password": {"$ne": ""}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22username%22%3A%20%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D%2C%20%22password%22%3A%20%7B%22%24ne%22%3A%20%22%22%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:45.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_004-1770842265502-0dibc5 pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_004 uri=/?q=%7B%22username%22%3A%20%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D%2C%20%22password%22%3A%20%7B%22%24ne%22%3A%20%22%22%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_004-1770842265502-0dibc5 pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_004 uri=/?q=%7B%22username%22%3A%20%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D%2C%20%22password%22%3A%20%7B%22%24ne%22%3A%20%22%22%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
